text: The entire contents of a vitural directory and all its subdirectories in a Tomcat+Apache configuration are displayed if the index.html file is not present.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text:
Fixed on version 3.2 and up you need to use the appropiate attribute for the 
Static Interceptor ( this applies to 3.2 and up only ) , the exact name of the 
attribute is documented on the server.xml file.

for 3.2 is :
suppress="true"

For query purposes, mark as fixed in Tomcat 3.3:
Fixed in Tomcat 3.3
creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
